ai.summary: A 13.2 km circular hike blending coastal marshland, boardwalks, and wildlife hides around Cley Spy, offering excellent birdwatching along the Norfolk coast.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat with a mix of gravel paths, wooden boardwalks over marsh, and grassy tracks. Expect soft, muddy ground after rain and occasional exposed coastal sections.
ai.safety_notes: Check weather and tide times before setting out. Wear sturdy waterproof footwear and windproof clothing. The route includes marshboardwalks and exposed coastal sections; some paths can be muddy and slippery. Carry water and snacks, a map or GPS, and a small first-aid kit. Be mindful of other walkers and wildlife; stay on paths and supervise children. If visibility is poor or sea spray is high, seek shelter in a bird hide and avoid high-tide areas.
recommended_gear: Dry bag or waterproof case for electronics
ai.best_seasons: Spring and autumn are ideal for birding, but the route can be enjoyed year-round.

seo.title: Cley Spy Circular Bird Walk - 13.2 km Coastal Wildlife Walk in Norfolk, UK
seo.meta_description: Explore the Cley Spy Circular Bird Walk, a 13.2 km moderate coastal circuit near Cley, Norfolk. Enjoy marshboardwalks, hides and abundant birdlife along the Norfolk coast.
